projects.name: ml-powered resume analysis system using spacy and scikit-learn
projects.description:

Lovely Professional University Jalandhar, Punjab
BTech (CSE - Data Science (ML and AI)) Graduation Date: Aug 2024
PROJECT EXPERIENCE
Lovley Professional University Jalandhar, Punjab
Resume Analyzer
Developed an ML-powered resume analysis system using spaCy and scikit-learn, achieving 92% accuracy in skill extraction and 85%
accuracy in job-resume matching across diverse industry domains, significantly outperforming traditional keyword-based methods.

projects.name: Engineered a robust...
projects.description:
Engineered a robust NLP pipeline processing 10,000+ resumes, implementing advanced text extraction from PDF/DOCX formats,
semantic analysis for skill identification, and domain-specific matching algorithms that consider experience levels, education, and
professional domains. Matches resumes with job descriptions with high accuracy and determined if candidates are fit for a job or in what areas are they lacking.

projects.name: lstm-based predictive maintenance system using the metro pd dataset
projects.description:
Lovely Professional University Jalandhar, Punjab
Machinery anamoly detecction May 2024 - Jul 2024
Developed an LSTM-based predictive maintenance system using the Metro PD dataset, successfully detecting anomalies in metro train
components with an accuracy of 85% and reducing false alarm rates by 40% compared to traditional threshold-based methods. Preprocessed and engineered features from 10,730 sensor measurements across multiple train subsystems, including traction, braking,
and door mechanisms, implementing effective data normalization and temporal sliding window techniques. Validated the model's performance on historical failure cases from the Metro PD dataset, achieving an early warning time of 5-7 days
before actual component failures.

projects.name: machine learning model to recognise handwritten text using the mnist handwritten digits dataset
projects.description:
Lovley Professional University Jalandhar, Punjab
Handwritten Text Recognition by machine learning Jun 2023 - Aug 2023
Developed a machine learning model to recognise handwritten text using the MNIST handwritten digits dataset.

projects.name: Used KNN(K Nearest...
projects.description: Used KNN(K Nearest Neighbour) and CNN(Convolutional Neural Network) for making the machine learning model. Finally compared the accuracies achieved by each model in recognising the handwritten text. Found out what locations, cuisines, services should a budding restaurant offer to maximise its profits.

projects.name: Used pandas, matplotlib,...
projects.description: Used pandas, matplotlib, Seaborn libraries to clean, visualise and represent the data respectively.
